Login_Page.login_description: Enter your email and password and start making a difference.

Register_Page.register_description: Create an account to start making a difference.
Register_Page.office_placeholder: e.g., Mayor, City Council, State Representative
Register_Page.organization_placeholder: e.g., Red Cross, Amnesty International, Local NGO
Register_Page.institution_placeholder: e.g., Harvard University, Local High School

WaysToSupport_Home.makeAPledge_Description: Join a campaign and pledge your support. Your voice matters in creating meaningful change.
WaysToSupport_Home.donate_Description: Support our operations with a one-time or recurring donation. Every contribution helps us expand our impact.
WaysToSupport_Home.volunteer_Description: Contribute your time and skills to our mission. Join our global network of dedicated volunteers.
WaysToSupport_Home.spreadAwareness_Description: Share our mission and campaigns with your network. Together, we can create a world of peace and understanding.
WaysToSupport_Home.share_Description: Join me in supporting peace initiatives around the world. Together we can make a difference!
WaysToSupport_Home.needHelpDeciding_Description: Not sure which support option is right for you? Our team is here to help you find the best way to contribute to our peace initiatives.
WaysToSupport_Home.impactOfYourSupport_Description: Your support makes a difference. Here's how your contributions can impact the world.
WaysToSupport_Home.impactOfYourSupport_Item1: $25 provides educational materials for peace workshops
WaysToSupport_Home.impactOfYourSupport_Item2: $50 helps organize a local peace dialogue session
WaysToSupport_Home.impactOfYourSupport_Item3: $100 supports conflict resolution training for community leaders
WaysToSupport_Home.impactOfYourSupport_Item4: $500 funds a peace-building initiative in a conflict zone

AllCampaigns_Page.campaigns_description: Let's create peace in the world!

Articles_Page.articles_description: Stay informed with our latest articles, insights, and updates on global peace initiatives and community actions.

Volunteering_Page.form_description: Ready to transform your skills into action? Fill out the form below to join our global network of peace advocates.
Volunteering_Page.form_about_placeholder: Tell us about yourself and why you want to volunteer
Volunteering_Page.form_skills_placeholder: What skills can you offer? (e.g., design, writing, marketing, event planning)
Volunteering_Page.form_availability_placeholder: When are you available to volunteer?
Volunteering_Page.waysToVolunteer_card1_description: Connect with celebrities, politicians, and influential figures to expand our reach and impact.
Volunteering_Page.waysToVolunteer_card2_description: Launch local initiatives that spread our message of peace through neighborhood outreach and engagement.

Contact_Page.form_description: Have questions about our initiatives or want to get involved? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
Contact_Page.contact_info_subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out using any of the contact methods below or visit our office.
Contact_Page.contact_info_mission_description: Pledge4Peace.org advocates for peace, democracy, and equal rights for all, regardless of religion, color, ethnicity, gender etc. Our mission is to strengthen global democracy by inspiring the peace-loving silent majority. Operated entirely by peace volunteers, we do not accept donations for ourselves but encourage pledges and contributions to political parties ranked high on the Peace and Democracy Index.

Footer.missionStatement: We stand firm in our belief that peace is possible through collective action and commitment.
Footer.footer_paragraph1: 501c3 NonProfit Aiming to Solve World's Biggest Problems Through Pledge.
Footer.footer_paragraph2: Our goal is to address the world's biggest challenges with a new approach where we bring the silent majority from around the world to pledge to visit and invest to create peace.

toastMessages.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete this {type}?
toastMessages.adminActionDescription: You are deleting content created by another user.
toastMessages.youMustBeLoggedInToComment: You must be logged in to comment

SingleCampaign_Page.wouldYouLikeToAmplifyYourImpact: Would you like to amplify your impact?
SingleCampaign_Page.considerMakingADonation: Consider making a donation to help us reach more people and strengthen our peace initiatives.
SingleCampaign_Page.yourSupportMeansALotToUs: Your support means a lot to us. You've successfully pledged to this campaign.
SingleCampaign_Page.toMakeAPledgeYouMustLogin: To make a pledge you must login
